casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Earl Wayne FLOWERS No. 103P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 7, 2017 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Earl Wayne Flowers, for Flowers, Earl Wayne.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Defendant on the 30th of March 2017 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Alexander County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of April 2017."
